mapper.select: SELECT rcomment.id as replyId,rcomment.content as replyContent, rcomment.id as replyId, rcomment.content as ccontent,rcomment.good, rcomment.rid as crid,rcomment.uid as cuid,rcomment.touid,rcomment.gmt_create as cgmt_create,cuser.nickname as cname,cuser.avatar as cavatar,tuser.nickname as tname FROM red_ask_reply_comment rcomment LEFT JOIN edu_user cuser on rcomment.uid = cuser.id LEFT JOIN edu_user tuser on rcomment.touid = tuser.id WHERE rcomment.uid = #{uid} ORDER BY rcomment.gmt_create DESC LIMIT 1
